entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
